title: Hip Hip Hooray! It's Joe's Birthday!
content:
A toast in your general direction. I’d sing to you but don’t want to be found to neglect any copyrights of the birthday song. ;^) Thanks for everything, Joe!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/happy_joe_6207.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/birthday_joe_5990.png)

(Images created using [http://metaatem.net/words/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439/http:/metaatem.net/words/ "http://metaatem.net/words/"))

 [‹ I'm looking for a sans that is meant to be drawn on an angle](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29131 "Go to previous forum topic") [Dumb Quotes on Portable Word Processor ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29037 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content: ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Joe_5646.gif)

Happy Birthday Joe! And because I like you so much I am sending you a box of Typophile t-shirts. The may all be too big though . . .

I gots none of them fancy-boy graphics to show, maybe later.
Happy Birthday! Thanks to you and Jared for Typophile :)

[Here is the card](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439/http:/www.fstopimages.com/fcards/view.php?id=3295b5552a2d4111) I sent to Joe, created with [an application](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439/http:/www.fstopimages.com/fcards) _he developed_:

[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/SafariScreenSnapz001_4190.png)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439/http:/www.fstopimages.com/fcards/view.php?id=3295b5552a2d4111)

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/JoeRocks2_5727.png)

ChrisL
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/b_6063.jpg)
Happy Birthday Joe!
Happy birthday, Joe!
Happy Birthday, Joe! Hip Hip Hurray!!!

joe, many many happy returns of the day.  
En’joe!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Untitled-2_5181.jpg)
  
..  
Wishes in a type designer’s style  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/typographer_5685.jpg)
  
.  
.  
Wishes in my favorite font...which i don’t have;)  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/joy%20bday_3977.jpg)
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/joebdaypdh06_6417.png)

Have a good one.  
Tim

Hip Hip Hooray! It’s Joe’s Birthday!  
Hip Hop Hooray! It’s Joe’s Birthday!  
Hop Hop Hooray! It’s Joe’s Birthday!  
Happy Birthday to Yoe, Dear Joe.

Happy Birthday, Joe!

You are **MIGHTY** , **JOE** and **YOUNG**!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/mighty_joe1_6675.jpg)

and not at all like that other monkey —

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/mightyjoedvd_5135.jpg)

Why I’ll be a monkey’s uncle! Norbert stopped by!

ChrisL

\> _Why I’ll be a monkey’s uncle!_

Be careful what you wish for, Chris...  
your niece would never forgive you if it came true, nor would I!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/planet_apes1_5325.jpg)

Sorry, Joe... back to the celebration! ;-)
How fonty?!

Well, Late, But: Happy Birthday, Joe.

Dav

Better late than never?!  
But be careful of that fonty she-monkey?!  
She will finish All?

Seriously the most creative birthday wishes I have ever seen on a forum, perhaps anywhere even.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

CLB

Design should never say “look at me.” It should say “look at this.”

Design should never say “look at me.” It should say “look at this.”

Well-said! From now onwards, I say:  
Do not look at poor me, Look at my [Flowers](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439/http:/www.crauswords.com/flowers/WFlowers.htm)  
Ton of Thanks 4 Your Guide
Happy Belated Birthday Joe! Hope you’re having a good one!

Happy Birthday Brother Joe!

:D
Thanks all for the birthday greets! (And thanks to Yves for pointing me to it, since I was actually not at work on my birthday.)

Happy BD Joe - ride on!

hhp

Satya, I was chuckling at the conjunction of birthday to b’day... It could be read as “happy bidet” which would have an entirely different meaning. =) Cheers.

Yves, where did you get that picture of me? That was when I was semi-blond, circa 2002. Haha.
[Flickr](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235439/http:/flickr.com/search/?q=joe%20pemberton&w=all), keywords “Joe” and “Pemberton”. Pretty straightforward, don’tchathink? :^P

“It could be read as “happy bidet” which would have an entirely different meaning.”

That’s right Joe, that meaning just wouldn’t wash :-)

ChrisL

\> “happy bidet”

That so has Hallmark card potential.

hhp

I see the baby must have got you up early Hrant?

ChrisL

This is pretty late. :-/

hhp

When my kids were that age, I had a hard tim e remembering if it was early one day or late the day before :-)

ChrisL
